architecture.encoder:
nn.Sequential {
  [input -> (1) -> (2) -> (3) -> (4) -> output]
  (1): nn.LookupTable
  (2): nn.Dropout(0.400000)
  (3): nn.LSTM(200 -> 512)
  (4): nn.Dropout(0.400000)
}
